description.p: binjr is a time series browser; it renders time series produced by other applications as dynamically editable graphical representations and provides advanced features to navigate the data smoothly and efficiently (drag & drop, zoom, history, detachable tabs, advanced time-range picker).

It can be use to visualize data from many different sources at once, mixed as part of a single representation or on separate but synchronised views, which is especially useful to correlate events of different kinds and from multiple sources but sharing a common timeline.

It aims to be the missing link between the collection of disparate tools (text editors, graphing & CLI utilities) traditionally used by developers and researcher to analyse data locally and full-blown analytics platforms that centralize logs and telemetry for entire organizations.
